overview:
Beatrice Farina is responsible for brand strategy and development, PR, digital media, events and communications as well as in-channel marketing for Shazam. She also devises the global marketing communications strategies for Shazam product launches with partners such as Apple, Android, Nokia and RIM.

Beatrice joined Shazam in March 2008 as Director of Marketing Communications to spearhead an in-depth marketing strategy and brand review. Today, Shazam has more than 75 million users with 1 million new users joining the service every week and it is available in over 200 countries.

Beatrice was promoted to Vice President, Marketing Communications in January 2010.

As well as experience in running her own successful marketing consultancy and driving marketing strategies at entrepreneurial start-ups such as SpinVox and Stubbi, Beatrice has extensive expertise with global blue-chip telecoms brands such as Marconi and MSI, where she was a key member of the management team that successfully sold to Marconi. As Director of Brand Programmes at Marconi, Beatrice advised the executive team on its global brand and wireless strategy.
